Privacy Policy - SongScribe Tuner

Last Updated: February 15, 2025

Introduction

SongScribe Tuner ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application ("the App").

Data We Collect

Data Stored Locally on Your Device

SongScribe Tuner stores the following data locally on your device. This data is NOT transmitted to our servers:

  • Tuner Settings: Your preferred instrument preset (Chromatic, Guitar, Ukulele, Bass, Violin)
  • Reference Pitch: Your customized reference pitch setting (default: 440Hz)
  • Note Display Style: Your preferred note notation (sharps vs. flats)
  • Theme Preference: Your chosen app theme (light/dark)
  • Ad Removal Status: Whether you purchased the "Remove Ads" upgrade

You have full control over this data. It remains on your device unless you choose to delete it by uninstalling the app.

Microphone Access

IMPORTANT: While SongScribe Tuner requires microphone access to detect pitch, we do NOT record, store, or transmit any audio data.

Your microphone input is:

  • Processed in real-time on your device
  • Used exclusively for pitch detection
  • Immediately discarded after processing
  • Never saved to storage
  • Never sent to our servers

Purchase Information

  • Transaction records for in-app purchases (processed by Apple)
  • "Remove Ads" purchase status (to provide ad-free experience)

Analytics Data (Optional)

If you opt in to analytics, we may collect:

  • App usage patterns (which features are used)
  • Device type and operating system version
  • App crash reports and performance data
  • General geographic region (country level only)

This data is collected in aggregate and cannot identify you personally.

Advertising Data (Free Version)

If you have NOT purchased "Remove Ads", Google AdMob may collect:

  • Ad impressions and interactions
  • Device advertising ID (resettable)
  • General location (for ad targeting)

See Google AdMob Privacy for details.

Feedback and Support

If you contact us for support:

  • Email address (if provided)
  • Device and system information (if you consent)
  • Description of issues or suggestions

Data We Do NOT Collect

  • ❌ We do NOT record or store microphone audio
  • ❌ We do NOT access your location (beyond country-level for analytics)
  • ❌ We do NOT access your contacts, photos, or other personal files
  • ❌ We do NOT sell or share your data with third parties for marketing
  • ❌ We do NOT track your identity across apps or websites

How We Use Your Data

We use collected data only for:

  • Providing the Service: Managing purchases and entitlements
  • Improving the App: Understanding usage patterns to improve features
  • Customer Support: Responding to your inquiries and resolving issues
  • Security: Detecting and preventing fraud or abuse
  • Advertising (Free Version): Serving relevant ads via Google AdMob

Third-Party Services

Apple App Store

Your purchases are processed through Apple. Apple's privacy policy applies to transaction data: apple.com/legal/privacy

Google AdMob (Free Version Only)

If you have not purchased "Remove Ads", we use Google AdMob to display advertisements. AdMob may collect:

  • Device advertising identifier
  • Ad interaction data
  • General location (country/region)

AdMob Privacy Policy: support.google.com/admob/answer/6128543

You can opt out of personalized ads in your device settings:

  • iOS: Settings → Privacy → Tracking → Disable "Allow Apps to Request to Track"

Analytics (PostHog)

If analytics is enabled, we use PostHog for aggregated usage analytics: posthog.com/privacy

Error Monitoring (Sentry)

We use Sentry to collect crash reports and error data to fix bugs and improve app stability. Sentry may collect:

  • Error messages and stack traces
  • Device type and operating system
  • App version and state at time of crash

This data is used solely for debugging. Sentry Privacy Policy: sentry.io/privacy

Data Retention

  • Local Settings: Stored on your device until you delete the app
  • Purchase Records: Retained as required for legal and accounting purposes
  • Analytics Data: Retained for up to 12 months in aggregate form
  • Support Communications: Retained for up to 24 months

Your Rights

Access and Export

  • Export your settings by contacting us
  • Request a copy of any data we hold about you

Delete

  • Uninstall the app to remove all local data
  • Request deletion of any data we hold about you

Opt Out

  • Disable analytics in the app settings
  • Disable ad tracking in your device settings
  • Purchase "Remove Ads" to eliminate advertising entirely

Children's Privacy

SongScribe Tuner is rated 4+ and is safe for all ages. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

  • All data transmission uses industry-standard encryption (HTTPS/TLS)
  • Local data is stored using secure iOS storage mechanisms
  • We regularly review and update our security practices
  • Microphone audio is never stored or transmitted

International Users

If you are located outside the United States, please note that analytics data may be processed in the United States where our servers are located. By using the App, you consent to such processing.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by:

  • Posting the new Privacy Policy in the app
  • Updating the "Last Updated" date above

Your continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

California Privacy Rights (CCPA)

If you are a California resident, you have additional rights under the CCPA:

  • Right to Know: Request information about data collection practices
  • Right to Delete: Request deletion of your personal information
  • Right to Opt-Out: Opt out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell your data)
  • Non-Discrimination: We will not discriminate against you for exercising your rights

GDPR Compliance (EU Users)

If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):

  • Right to Access: Request a copy of your personal data
  • Right to Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data
  • Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
  • Right to Data Portability: Receive your data in a portable format
  • Right to Object: Object to processing of your data for certain purposes

Contact Us

For questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your privacy rights:

  • Email: privacy@songscribe.io
  • Website: tuner.songscribe.io
  • Support: support@songscribe.io

Summary

In plain terms:

✅ Your microphone audio is never recorded or stored

✅ Settings stay on your device only

✅ We collect minimal data needed to provide the service

✅ You can delete your data at any time

✅ We're transparent about what we collect and why

✅ Purchase "Remove Ads" to eliminate advertising entirely

By using SongScribe Tuner, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.
